REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0268 reute r f BC-DIGICON-<DGC>-COMPLET 03-04 0043

TEXT.TITLE: DIGICON <DGC> COMPLETES SALE OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Digicon Inc said it has completed the previously-announced disposition of its computer systems division to an investment group led by <Rotan Mosle Inc's> Rotan Mosle Technology Partners Ltd affiliate. Reuter
